ISSUE.TITLE: PHP Notice thrown if no created / published posts and requesting Custom Post Type
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: In this scenario, php returns a notice in which the `$post` object in `wp-includes/post-template.php` is null. ``` Notice: Trying to get property of non-object in wp-includes/post-template.php on line 209 ``` Again, the notice throws only when no posts are created / published and you are attempting to request a custom post type (ie wp-json.php/posts?type=custom_post_type) Tested with: WP 3.8.1 WP-API 0.8
